spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatches. (E2/E4) Kitchen zone in the 2D plan (top-left open kitchen with L-shaped counters) is not represented as a kitchen in the 3D render; it reads as open living space with minimal cabinetry. (E2/E3) Main circulation/foyer and interior door locations do not align with the plan’s bottom-center entry and adjacent closets/baths. (E2) The right-side connection wall/door location ("Chandler & Joey's apartment" door on living room right wall) is not clearly present in the 3D. (E2/E4) Wall geometry shows smoothed/angled/curved partitions that do not match the plan’s orthogonal, stepped perimeter and room corners. (E2) Window locations don’t match the plan: the plan’s specific window runs/placements (large living room window on the top wall and other room windows) are not consistently mirrored; the 3D appears to introduce/shift window placement and sizing.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency and enclosure fidelity are weak. (E1) Several plan-defined subspaces (closets/coat closet/entry storage) are missing or not clearly modeled as separate enclosed rooms. (E1/E2) Bathroom count/placement does not reliably match the 2D plan (which indicates multiple wet areas/fixtures across two bath zones); the 3D suggests fewer or relocated bath partitions. (E2) Bedroom placement/room boundaries differ from plan: the left bedroom suite and its relationship to the left bath/coat area is not preserved. (E4) Wall thickness and stepped perimeter offsets from the plan are not consistently preserved; multiple walls appear simplified.

furniture_mapping.notes: (E2) Dining/living furniture roughly resembles the plan conceptually (table + seating + sofa zone) but positions are shifted relative to kitchen edge and circulation. (E1/E2) Kitchen appliances/counters from the 2D plan are largely absent or replaced with minimal generic cabinetry. (E4) Some furniture appears scaled/placed to fit the altered room proportions rather than matching plan-driven dimensions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is visually clean and coherent but not plan-faithful. Isometric camera is acceptable and composition is clear. Lighting is soft and consistent. Geometry is mostly clean, though several walls are oddly curved/angled compared to the plan, which reads as modeling distortion relative to the source rather than intentional design.

detected_errors.description: Missing kitchen build-out: L-shaped counters/appliances shown in the 2D plan are not modeled as a distinct kitchen layout in the 3D render.
Misplaced/unclear exterior/inter-apartment door: the 2D plan shows a door on the living room right wall (to Chandler & Joey’s), but the 3D render does not clearly show it in the correct location.
Missing or not clearly separated closets/coat closet/entry storage areas that are explicitly labeled in the 2D plan.
Bathroom placement/count does not match the 2D plan’s wet-area zoning; the 3D appears to simplify and/or relocate bathroom partitions/fixtures.
Perimeter and internal wall geometry is simplified and/or distorted: the 2D plan’s stepped orthogonal outline and corners are replaced with angled/curved walls in the 3D.
Window placement and sizing do not consistently match the 2D plan; at least some window runs appear shifted or introduced differently in the 3D.
Several interior door swing/orientations implied by the 2D plan are not respected; openings in the 3D do not match the plan’s door positions and directions.
Bedroom boundaries/adjacency (especially the left-side bedroom suite relative to nearby bath/coat zone) are altered compared to the 2D plan.
